gameDetails.name: XenoShyft: Psychogenics Lab Expansion
gameDetails.description:
The Psychogenics Lab is the key to unlocking the limitless potential of the human mind. Going far beyond cybernetics and AI-enhancements, Xenosathem allows boosts to human mental abilities across the spectrum. From mental acuity to creativity up to telepathy and even telekinesis, the human mind need no longer be shackled by the creeping, plodding pace of evolution!

This expansion box contains:

     1 Psychogenics Lab Division Card
     1 Psychogenics Rules Card
     6 Psychogenics Item Tracker Cards
     30 Psychogenics Item Cards
